short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Content collector extension for FlypSite social walls

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension reads page contents (metadata and HTML-Body contents) of one specific page when a user clicks on the extension icon while browsing this page.
The extension sends information found in the page (title, description, author, image URL, video URL) to FlypSite.
FlypSite takes the information transmitted and produces a "microformat post" suitable for publication on the user's social media wall or live blog.
